intro.text1:
All events in one place
Always up-to-date
intro.text2:
Tap to get all the event details
Dates, features,
spawns and more
intro.text3:
Tap the bell icon to
get notifications both before
and when an event starts

details.cannot_sub_desc: You disabled all notifications in the settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.all_desc: After re-enabling, you can restart the app to resubscribe.
settings.days_title: How many days before do you want to be notified?
settings.days_desc: This setting will apply on new opt-ins.
